rows.label: qev035401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, you're a BLADE too, right? Then you'd be smart
to watch out for Gus and his crew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0002
rows.name:
I had good people die after those bastards set their
sights on my team. And for what? ...For nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Quincy to tell you more about Gus.

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Quincy about his team.

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0003
rows.name:
My team and I were in the field collecting research
samples.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0004
rows.name:
A man calling himself Gus approached with some men
and said that indigens had killed most of his team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Obviously we felt terrible, so we said we'd help with
their bounty mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0006
rows.name:
We fought the targets to the edge of a tall cliff,
and as soon as the battle was finished...
Gus and his men pushed us off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0007
rows.name:
It was all a lie. They just wanted the reward without
doing the work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0008
rows.name:
My crew and I still had two missions left to finish,
but I was the only one to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0009
rows.name:
Thought I'd go crazy from anger and grief.
Even did for a little while, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0010
rows.name:
I led a small team of people I knew from back in our
old Coalition days. We were close. Soul mates, even.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0011
rows.name: But they're gone now. I'm the only one left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0012
rows.name:
A man named Gus and his crew tricked us into helping
them, then killed everyone but me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0013
rows.name:
I guess we were naive, though I'd like to think that my
guys were just good people. Plus, no one really thought
to doubt a fellow BLADE, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0014
rows.name:
We still had two critical missions left to complete,
but now... Well, it's just a damn shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0015
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0016
rows.name: So look. I know this is a lot to ask—I get that—but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0017
rows.name:
is there any way I could get you to join me?
Temporarily, I mean. Just until I finish the missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0018
rows.name: I know it's probably a little sentimental, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well, I want to finish what we all started.
My people were proud BLADEs, and they deserve it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0020
rows.name: You're a good person. Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Even after what's happened, with all the challenges
we've faced since leaving Earth, I can't help but feel a
deep connection with other BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0031
rows.name: Celebrate your shared bond with Quincy.

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Quincy that you're only in it for the credits.

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0022
rows.name:
I knew you'd get it. Honestly, I think Gus and his ilk
are some kind of aberration that shouldn't exist.
Damn them all to hell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0023
rows.name: ...Sorry. Got a little emotional there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0024
rows.name:
Anyway, I need your help hunting a linker scirpo near
Rust Lake in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0025
rows.name: It's a dangerous target, so be very careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0026
rows.name: For the...credits? You're no better than Gus![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0027
rows.name:
It isn't right! BLADEs are supposed to put others first!
To make sure that EVERYONE is safe, no matter what!
And you're just a greedy jerk who can't see that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0028
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0029
rows.name:
I...I'm sorry. I'm asking you a favor here,
then I go and insult you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0030
rows.name: Besides, one look tells me you're nothing like Gus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0031
rows.name:
So look. The first mission I need your help with is
hunting a linker scirpo near Rust Lake in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0032
rows.name: It's a dangerous target, so be very careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0033
rows.name:
The first mission is hunting a linker scirpo near
Rust Lake in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0034
rows.name: It's supposed to be strong as hell, so be careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0035
rows.name:
Weeeee are the BLAAADEs, final hope of humankiiind!
Paaartners in peeeace, leaving nooo one behiiiind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0036
rows.name:
Gaaaaah! Y-you're back! And just...standing there.
Listening to me. Well, this is awkward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0037
rows.name:
Er, so that was our team song. I like to sing it
sometimes to help me remember the guys.
Anyway, what's the status on the mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0050
rows.name: Report

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Quincy that the hunt is over and Gus appeared.

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0060
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Quincy to keep singing.

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Er... Well, if you insist, I'm happy to share a verse or
two of The Ballad of the BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0039
rows.name:
Far from Mother Eaaarth, in search of a new hooome!
Remaiiining ever viiigilant and tiiireless as we roooam![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0040
rows.name:
Though we may shed teeears for aaall we have looost,
we support one anoooother and surviiiiive at any cost![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0041
rows.name:
Weee are the BLAAADEs, final hope of humankiiind!
Paaartners in peeeace, leaving nooo one behiiiind...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0042
rows.name:
...Whew! Sorry, I got a little carried away there.
Anyway, that's the first 13 verses. Plus codas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0043
rows.name:
So what'd you think? Did it give you a sense of how
tight we were?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0044
rows.name:
Great. That's great. Now what were we...?
Oh! Right! How did the mission go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0045
rows.name: ...Gus and his men turned up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0046
rows.name: I wonder if he was watching when I asked you to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0047
rows.name:
I hate to think of what he might be planning,
but could I ask you to help with one last mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0070
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0071
rows.name: Agree to take on Quincy's final mission.

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0080
rows.name: Negotiate

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0081
rows.name: Say you'll consider it if he ups the reward.

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0048
rows.name:
Augh, I'm overcome! We're kindred spirits, you and I!
Now sing with me! Sing! SIIIIING![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0049
rows.name:
Er, no? No singing? You sure? Even if I hum a few...
Right, then. Guess I'll move on to the second mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0050
rows.name:
We need to retrieve a rare stone known as the
Crimson Tear from Devil's Colony in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0051
rows.name: ...Money? Since when does a BLADE care for lucre?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0052
rows.name:
Well, not to worry. If you retrieve the gem they call the
Crimson Tear, you can have the reward to yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0053
rows.name:
The Crimson Tear is said to lie in the deepest part of
Devil's Colony over in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0054
rows.name:
But I've heard rumors of terrible indigens living in
those caverns, so be prepared for anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0055
rows.name:
This is Team Quincy's final task. Please retrieve the
Crimson Tear from Devil's Colony in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0056
rows.name:
I'm glad you're back safe. How did it go?
Did you find the Crimson Tear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0057
rows.name: Yes, this is it! What a stunning gem...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0058
rows.name:
...Wait, you saw Gus and his men provoking the
creatures there? And then they were EATEN?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0059
rows.name: Wow. I almost feel bad for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0091
rows.name: Say that you also feel pity for Gus's death.

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0100
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0101
rows.name: Insist that you will spare no pity for traitors.

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0060
rows.name:
Crooked or not, they were BLADEs. At some point,
they must have wanted to help the people of New LA
at least a little bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0061
rows.name:
Mira's a harsh place. Maybe they stumbled along the
way somewhere. Strayed from their path.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0062
rows.name:
I can't judge you for that. It's possible my dead friends
are resting easier now, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0063
rows.name:
Here. This is the combined reward for both missions.
Please take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0064
rows.name:
And thank you again. Now my old friends can be at
peace until we find the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0065
rows.name:
I'm glad you're back safe. How did it go?
Did you find the Crimson Tear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0066
rows.name: ...What? Gus tricked you out of it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0067
rows.name:
Why would you try to save him? He killed my friends
and your fellow BLADEs! He even attacked YOU![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0110
rows.name: Show Faith

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0111
rows.name:
Say that you wanted to have confidence
in a fellow BLADE, no matter what.

rows.label: qev035401_JNK0120
rows.name: Assert Duty

rows.label: qev035401_SEL0121
rows.name:
Tell Quincy that you felt bound
to help a person in danger.

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0068
rows.name:
Even knowing he might betray you? Wow.
You're really something else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0069
rows.name:
Sometimes the body reacts without thinking,
so I don't suppose I can blame you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0070
rows.name:
Well, I guess you're officially as gullible as the rest of
Team Quincy, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0071
rows.name:
I'm just sorry I only have the reward from the bounty
mission to offer you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0072
rows.name:
But looking at you, I feel sure that my friends who died
trusting that bastard to the end had the right of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035401_MSG0073
rows.name: So...thank you.[ST:wait ]
